name: QuadraticModuleCat.instMonoidalCategory.tensorObj_form
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : Invertible 2
X Y : QuadraticModuleCat R
⊢ Eq (QuadraticModuleCat.instMonoidalCategory.tensorObj X Y).form (X.form.tmul Y.form)
decl:
/-- Auxiliary definition used to build `QuadraticModuleCat.instMonoidalCategory`. -/
@[simps! form]
noncomputable abbrev tensorObj (X Y : QuadraticModuleCat.{u} R) : QuadraticModuleCat.{u} R :=
  of (X.form.tmul Y.form)

name: QuadraticModuleCat.toModuleCat_tensor
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : Invertible 2
X Y : QuadraticModuleCat R
⊢ Eq (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj X Y).toModuleCat (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.tensorObj X.toModuleCat Y.toModuleCat)
decl:
@[simp] theorem toModuleCat_tensor (X Y : QuadraticModuleCat.{u} R) :
    (X ⊗ Y).toModuleCat = X.toModuleCat ⊗ Y.toModuleCat := rfl

name: QuadraticModuleCat.forget₂_map_associator_hom
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : Invertible 2
X Y Z : QuadraticModuleCat R
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.forget₂ (QuadraticModuleCat R) (ModuleCat R)).map (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).hom) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X.toModuleCat Y.toModuleCat Z.toModuleCat).hom
decl:
theorem forget₂_map_associator_hom (X Y Z : QuadraticModuleCat.{u} R) :
    (forget₂ (QuadraticModuleCat R) (ModuleCat R)).map (α_ X Y Z).hom =
      (α_ X.toModuleCat Y.toModuleCat Z.toModuleCat).hom := rfl

name: QuadraticModuleCat.forget₂_map_associator_inv
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : Invertible 2
X Y Z : QuadraticModuleCat R
⊢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.forget₂ (QuadraticModuleCat R) (ModuleCat R)).map (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X Y Z).inv) (CategoryTheory.MonoidalCategoryStruct.associator X.toModuleCat Y.toModuleCat Z.toModuleCat).inv
decl:
theorem forget₂_map_associator_inv (X Y Z : QuadraticModuleCat.{u} R) :
    (forget₂ (QuadraticModuleCat R) (ModuleCat R)).map (α_ X Y Z).inv =
      (α_ X.toModuleCat Y.toModuleCat Z.toModuleCat).inv := rfl
